name: Danger Zone
description: Danger Zone is a vehicular destruction game from seasoned genre veterans Three Fields Entertainment. Step into the shoes of a dangerous driver and cause the biggest car crashes ever seen in a video game. Danger Zone combines real physical crashes with explosive gameplay.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: Intel i5 3.2GHz / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 750ti / AMD Radeon R7 265 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space Additional Notes: Supports game controller, mouse and keyboard and Cloud Saves
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: Intel i7 3.5GHz / AMD FX 9590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space
